post_title: FS Graded HOF and some Raw commons
post_content:
For sale are the following cards.  Price includes shipping for all cards.  Add 3% if paying by a goods and services method.  PayPal FF preferred.   

Please message me with any questions.  You can also email me at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url].

First I'll take it supersedes any ongoing negotiations.

Thanks, Frank

Flick Sovereign 150 SGC 1 (PSA only has 7 graded with this back) = $350
Marquard Old Mill SGC 2 = $600
Bresnahan Pied 150 SGC Authentic = $110
Bender Portrait Pied 350 = $SOLD
Baker Pied 350 = $SOLD

Raw Cards:

Shaw Sovereign 150 = $100
Maloney and Poland together = $55
